test_message: What autopays are due this week?

flagged_anomalies.note: Payment is $10.95 (13.4%) higher than your average utility bill. Please review for possible rate increases or unusual usage.

result.payment_patterns_summary: Three autopays are scheduled this week. Rent and streaming subscription amounts remain consistent with prior months. City Utilities shows a 13.4% increase over your average bill—monitor for trending increases or review for accuracy.
